text: Lennart Forsberg (28 March 1928 - 6 September 2020) was a Swedish footballer. He played as a left winger. Forsberg debuted in 1945 with GIF Sundsvall. He also played for Djurg√•rden. Forsberg died on 6 September 2020 at the age of 92.Lennart Forsberg ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swedish footballers
